title: [2026 Spring] p-adic Hodge Theory Seminar
text:
Time/Venue: To be announced (2-3 hours)
Topics

Introductory p-adic Hodge theory
Integral p-adic Hodge theory
The Fargues-Fontaine curve

References

Serin Hong, Lecture notes on p-adic Hodge theory.
Brinon & Conrad - CMI Summer School Notes on p-adic Hodge Theory.
